1.name: The Outsiders
1.description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

2.name: Scarface
2.description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

3.name: National Lampoon's Vacation
3.description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

4.name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
4.description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

5.name: Twilight Zone: The Movie
5.description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

6.name: Christine
6.description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

7.name: Sleepaway Camp
7.description: Angela Baker, a traumatized and very shy young girl, is sent to summer camp with her cousin. Shortly after her arrival, anyone with sinister or less than honorable intentions gets their comeuppance.

8.name: Trading Places
8.description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

9.name: Terms of Endearment
9.description: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

10.name: Flashdance
10.description: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

11.name: La chiave
11.description: In 1940s Venice, after twenty years of marriage, a Professor and his younger wife witness the passion wane. Now, all that remains is to confess the rousing thoughts to an elaborate diary hoping to break free from ties and inhibitions.

12.name: Valley Girl
12.description: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

13.name: WarGames
13.description: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

14.name: The Hunger
14.description: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

15.name: Octopussy
15.description: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

16.name: Private School
16.description: Christine (Phoebe Cates), a student at an exclusive all-girls private school, is in love with Jim, who attends an academy for boys nearby. Christine's arch rival Jordan also has her eye on ...                See full summary »

17.name: Videodrome
17.description: When he acquires a different kind of show for his station, a sleazy cable-TV programmer begins to see his life and the future of media spin out of control in a terrifying new reality.

18.name: Risky Business
18.description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

19.name: The Right Stuff
19.description: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

20.name: Never Say Never Again
20.description: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

21.name: Cujo
21.description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

22.name: A Christmas Story
22.description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

23.name: Blue Thunder
23.description: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

24.name: Staying Alive
24.description: It's five years later and Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet - succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

25.name: Superman III
25.description: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

26.name: The Dead Zone
26.description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

27.name: The Big Chill
27.description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

28.name: Psycho II
28.description: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

29.name: Local Hero
29.description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don't go as expected.

30.name: Krull
30.description: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

31.name: Rumble Fish
31.description: Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.

32.name: Class
32.description: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

33.name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
33.description: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

34.name: The Prey
34.description: Six campers jaunt off to North Point, where they're promptly stalked and killed by a ghoulish man who ultimately is just looking for a little love.

35.name: Mr. Mom
35.description: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

36.name: Nostalgia
36.description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy to research the life of an 18th-century composer.

37.name: Jaws 3-D
37.description: The sons of police chief Brody must protect customers at a SeaWorld theme park after a thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in the park with them.

38.name: The Meaning of Life
38.description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

39.name: Bad Boys
39.description: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

40.name: The House on Sorority Row
40.description: After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

41.name: Deathstalker
41.description: The warrior Deathstalker is tasked by an old witch to obtain and unite the three powers of creation - a chalice, an amulet, and a sword - lest the evil magician Munkar get them and use them...                See full summary »

42.name: Silkwood
42.description: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

43.name: Lone Wolf McQuade
43.description: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

44.name: My Tutor
44.description: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

45.name: Cross Creek
45.description: In 1930's Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings moves to Florida's backwaters to write in peace. She feels bothered by affectionate men, editor and confused neighbors, but soon she connects and writes The Yearling, a classic of American literature.

46.name: Fire and Ice
46.description: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.

47.name: Angst
47.description: A troubled man gets released from prison and starts taking out his sadistic fantasies on an unsuspecting family living in a secluded house.

48.name: Sudden Impact
48.description: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

49.name: All the Right Moves
49.description: A high school football player desperate for a scholarship and his headstrong coach clash in a dying Pennsylvania steel town.

50.name: Doctor Detroit
50.description: A timid college professor, conned into posing as a flamboyant pimp, finds himself enjoying his new occupation on the streets.
